siteMetadata.title: Micro Binfie Virtual Conference 2020
siteMetadata.subtitle: An online seminar series chaired by the Micro Binfie Podcast

frontmatter.title: Session 3, 29nd April 2020
frontmatter.description: With talks from Taylor Paisie, Federica Palma and Melinda Ashcroft

frontmatter.title: Session 2, 22nd April 2020
frontmatter.description: With talks from Taylor Paisie, Federica Palma and Melinda Ashcroft

frontmatter.title: Session 1, 15th April 2020
frontmatter.description: Talks in this session include EnteroBase: exploit core genomic diversity of bacterial pathogens, Intro to IRIDA Pipeline Plugins, and cgMLST Re-visited: Evolvement and Challenges

frontmatter.title: Session 4
frontmatter.description: German inventor Johannes Gutenberg developed a method of movable type and used it to create one of the western world’s first major printed books, the “Forty–Two–Line” Bible.
